title: Lemon Press (Advanced Media at Arizona State University)
content:
Hello,  
 [Lemon Press](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/vimeo.com/9686565) is a video created by students in [Advanced Media](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s), a course in the [School of Design Innovation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/design.asu.edu/sdi/) at [Arizona State University](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/www.asu.edu/). For more context on this work-in-progress, [see other videos from this class](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/typophile.com/node/68269) or [read the official project description on the course syllabus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s/1.html). The video was produced by Patrick Clark, Huilin Dai, Maria Ionova, Brandon Mah, Matthew Mang, Forrest Nutter, Arnon Vasunirachorn and Nicholas Winter.

[http://vimeo.com/9686565](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/vimeo.com/9686565)

<param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always">
<param name="movie" value="http://vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=9686565&server=vimeo.com&show_title=1&show_byline=1&show_portrait=0&color=00ADEF&fullscreen=1">

[Lemon Press](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/vimeo.com/9686565) from [Matthew Mang](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/vimeo.com/matthewmang) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210814/http:/vimeo.com/).

We look forward your feedback.  
Thank you.
author: tannerwoodford
